reqs:
This course replaces GEOG 210. Students who have previously taken GEOG 210 are not permitted to take GEOG 311.
Note: This is a wait list for GEOG 311, section 201, Term 2. You will be moved into active registration if space becomes available. Wait list does not guarantee placement in this course.
description: The impact of urban development on the natural environment and vice versa. Study of the ecology and metabolism of cities and green urban design, using global and local case studies.
